page.title: 10Brenchley School Musical.
page.content: Every year Brenchley & Matfield C.E.P. School puts on a musical.The {fourth year}take the main parts,with chorus help from the third year and additional singing from the lower school choir.These musicals have become almost a{tradition. { }This year the musical is{"Annie Get {Your Gun"}it was shown in the West End about ten years ago. Before starting rehearsals our director had to decide who was playing what parts and who was needed to help with costumes,scenery, props and makeup. Helped in the production by our {musical director,}our{director}has very often threatened us and nagged us,but if she hadn't the musical would have been a flop.The rehearsals have mainly been after school and often spoiled plans for going out,but I must say it has all been worthwhile.
